list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the faculty or power of seeing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Joseph lost his sight as a baby
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Joseph mất tầm nhìn như một đứa bé

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing that one sees or that can be seen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: John was a familiar sight in the bar for many years
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: John là một cảnh tượng quen thuộc trong quán bar trong nhiều năm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device on a gun or optical instrument used for assisting a person's precise aim or observation.
manage to see or observe (someone or something); catch an initial glimpse of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: tell me when you sight London Bridge
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nói cho tôi biết khi bạn nhìn thấy cầu London

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take aim by looking through the sights of a gun.
